originalSubject: Your application for Software Engineer at TechCorp
originalBody:
Hi Parth,

Thank you for applying to the Software Engineer position at TechCorp. We're excited to move forward with your application.

Would you be available for a technical interview this week? We have openings on Tuesday at 2pm or Thursday at 10am.

Please let me know your preference and we'll send over the meeting details.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
Talent Acquisition
